==Spring==
* [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] receives a message from [[Kings of Rohan|King]] [[Éomer]] that he wishes to see him.<ref name="Later"/>
* Meriadoc takes counsel with [[Peregrin Took]]; they leave their belongings to their sons, Pippin takes with him a copy of the [[Thain's Book]]<ref name=records/> and they depart [[the Shire]] from [[Sarn Ford]] into the south.<ref name="Later">{{App|Later}}</ref>
* [[Faramir Took I]] succeeds his father Peregrin Took as [[Thain]] of [[the Shire]].<ref name="Later"/>

==Autumn==
* Death of [[Kings of Rohan|King]] [[Éomer]].<ref name="Later"/><ref name=mark>{{App|Mark}}</ref><ref name="note" group="note">Éomer's death is given as S.R. 1484 in the [[Appendix B]] and "F.A. 63 ([Third Age] 308'''4''')" in the [[Appendix A]], therefore while these events happened in S.R. 1484 aka F.A. 63 of the Shire, they correspond to Fourth Age 6'''4''' ([[Third Age 3084|Third Age 308'''4''']]) by the reckoning of Gondor. Note that while in the [[Shire Calendar]] the year [[2 Yule|begins]] in midwinter, in the [[New Reckoning|Calendar of Gondor]] it [[yestare|begins]] almost [[25 March|2 months later]].</ref>
* [[Elfwine]], son of Éomer, becomes the nineteenth King of [[Rohan]].<ref name=mark/>
* Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took then travel on to [[Gondor]].<ref name="Later"/> Peregrin brings the copy of the [[Thain's Book]].<ref name=records>{{FR|Records}}</ref>

{{references|note}}
